metadata.title: CVE-2022-34485 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Mozilla developers Bryce Seager van Dyk and the Mozilla Fuzzing Teamreported potential vulnerabilities present in Firefox 101. Some of thesebugs showed evidence of memory corruption and we presume that with enougheffort some of these could have been exploited to run arbitrary code. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 102.

criterions.comment: mozjs78: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs91: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
